name: Find the Gnome
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Onboard graphics, DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics DirectX: Version 11
